result.execSummary:
The defendant Devone A. Patterson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Neglecting a Child, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 948.21(1)(a).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: The defendant shall pay Department of Correction fees as directed by the agent.  Defendant was ordered to report immediately to the probation and parole office.

miscConds.notes: Defendant is ordered to pay the DNA surcharge, and to make arrangements to provide a DNA sample for testing through the Clark County Sheriff Department or if on probation, to the Department of Corrections as is required in all criminal convictions.
Defendant shall attend counseling, treatments, programming, evaluations as deemed appropriate by the agent releasing all records to the agent upon request

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Devone A. Patterson

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.
Notice of court ordered financial obligations

records.addlTxt: Prosecutor Kerra Stumbris and Defendant, Devone A. Patterson appeared, pro se agreement reached  Defendant finalized  waiver of  right to an attorney after full colloquy. Defendant entered a plea of guilty.

Pre-trial conference at 08-04-2015 02:00 pm.
Status conference at 08-27-2015 09:50 am.

Prosecutor Kerra Stumbris and Defendant, Devone A. Patterson appeared, pro se  Waived time limits for the preliminary hearing.  Defendant was advised of right to attorney and waived that right  at this time.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 4, 2015 at 02:00 pm.  Status conference scheduled for August 27, 2015 at 09:50 am.

Prosecutor Kerra Stumbris and Defendant, Devone A. Patterson appeared, pro se  Defendant will seek an attorney  Court admonished defendant to obtain counsel or the right to counsel may be forfeited.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for July 23, 2015 at 08:40 am.
The defendant shall not engage in any violent or disorderly contact with D.P., D.P., A.P., A.P. of any kind.
Prosecutor Kerra Stumbris and Defendant, Devone A. Patterson appeared, pro se, in custody.  Defendant advised of right to an attorney.  Initial appearance scheduled for June 18, 2015 at 10:10 am.
